In one of his defining roles, Forest Whitaker brings a commanding serenity to his portrayal of a Zen contract killer working for a bumbling mob outfit, a modern man who adheres steadfastly to the ideals of the Japanese warrior code even as chaos and violence spiral around him. 521 8 MPAA rating: R; for strong violence and language. 538 Blu-ray, wide screen (1.85:1 aspect ratio); 5.1 surround; requires Blu-ray player. 546 English dialogue; English subtitles; subtitled for the deaf and hard of hearing (SDH). 650 0 Murder for hire|vDrama. 650 0 Bushido|vDrama. 650 0 Samurai|xConduct of life|vDrama. 650 0 Gangsters|xConduct of life|vDrama. 650 0 Mafia|zUnited States|vDrama. 655 7 Feature films.|2lcgft 655 7 Video recordings for the hearing impaired.|2lcgft 655 7 Action and adventure films.|2lcgft 655 7 Drama.|2lcgft 655 7 Crime films.|2lcgft 700 1 Jarmusch, Jim,|d1953-|efilm director. 700 1 Whitaker, Forest,|eactor. 700 1 Gorman, Cliff,|eactor. 700 1 Silva, Henry,|d1926-2022|eactor. 700 1 Vessey, Tricia,|d1972-|eactor. 700 1 Portnow, Richard,|d1950-|eactor. 700 0 RZA|c(Rapper),|eactor. 710 2 Plywood Productions,|eproduction company. 730 0 Ghost dog (Motion picture) 830 0 Criterion collection. 999 MARCIVE done
